train_model(train_x, train_y, retrain=True, hyperpars=None, n_cvs=5)[source]¶

Initializes and train feature generation, selection and forecasting model in a pipeline

Parameters:
  • train_x (numpy.ndarray) – training data, inputs
  • train_y (numpy.ndarray) – training data, targets
  • retrain (bool) – Flag that specifies if the model needs retraining
  • hyperpars – defines ranges of hyperparameters to tune with cross-validation. If None is specified,

no hyperparameters will be optimized :type hyperpars: dict :param n_cvs: number of folds in k-fold cross-validation :type n_cvs: int :return: trained model, forecasting model, generator and selector :rtype: tuple

Forecasting.frc_class.cv_train(raw_model, X, Y, hyperpars, n_cvs)[source]¶

Use cross-validation to choose optimal hyperparameter values from the given range

Parameters:
  • raw_model (instance of PipelineModel) – model
  • X (numpy.ndarray) – training data, inputs
  • Y (numpy.ndarray) – training data, targets
  • hyperpars (dict) – contains ranges of frc_model hyperparameters
  • n_cvs (int) – number of cross-validation splits
Returns:
Return type:

list
